member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ContentTypeOptionsConstants
member.summary: X-Content-Type-Options-related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ContentTypeOptionsConstants.Header
member.summary: Header value for X-Content-Type-Options

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ContentTypeOptionsConstants.NoSniff
member.summary: Disables content sniffing

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.FrameOptionsConstants
member.summary: X-Frame-Options related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.FrameOptionsConstants.Header
member.summary: The header value for X-Frame-Options

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.FrameOptionsConstants.Deny
member.summary: The page cannot be displayed in a frame, regardless of the site attempting to do so.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.FrameOptionsConstants.SameOrigin
member.summary: The page can only be displayed in a frame on the same origin as the page itself.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.FrameOptionsConstants.AllowFromUri
member.summary: The page can only be displayed in a frame on the specified origin. {0} specifies the format string

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants
member.summary: Referrer-Policy related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Header
member.summary: The header value for Content-Security-Policy

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.No_Referrer
member.summary: The Referrer header will be omitted entirely. No referrer information is sent along with requests.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.No_Referrer_When_Downgrade
member.summary: This is the user agent's default behavior if no policy is specified. The URL is sent as a referrer when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTP→HTTP, HTTPS→HTTPS), but isn't sent to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Origin
member.summary: Only send the origin of the document as the referrer in all cases. The document https://example.com/page.html will send the referrer https://example.com/.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Origin_When_Cross_Origin
member.summary: Send a full URL when performing a same-origin request, but only send the origin of the document for other cases.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Same_Origin
member.summary: A referrer will be sent for same-site origins, but cross-origin requests will contain no referrer information.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Strict_Origin
member.summary: Only send the origin of the document as the referrer when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTPS→HTTPS), but don't send it to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Strict_Origin_When_Cross_Origin
member.summary: Send a full URL when performing a same-origin request, only send the origin when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTPS→HTTPS), and send no header to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ReferrerPolicyConstants.Unsafe_Url
member.summary: Send a full URL when performing a same-origin or cross-origin request. This policy will leak origins and paths from TLS-protected resources to insecure origins. Carefully consider the impact of this setting.

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ServerConstants
member.summary: Server header related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.ServerConstants.Header
member.summary: The header value for X-Powered-By

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants
member.summary: Strict-Transport-Security-related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants.OneYearInSeconds
member.summary: The number of seconds in one year

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants.Header
member.summary: Header value for Strict-Transport-Security

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants.MaxAge
member.summary: Tells the user-agent to cache the domain in the STS list for the provided number of seconds {0}

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants.MaxAgeIncludeSubdomains
member.summary: Tells the user-agent to cache the domain in the STS list for the provided number of seconds {0} and include any sub-domains.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.StrictTransportSecurityConstants.NoCache
member.summary: Tells the user-agent to remove, or not cache the host in the STS cache.

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants
member.summary: X-XSS-Protection-related constants.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants.Header
member.summary: Header value for X-XSS-Protection

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants.Enabled
member.summary: Enables the XSS Protections

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants.Disabled
member.summary: Disables the XSS Protections offered by the user-agent.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants.Block
member.summary: Enables XSS protections and instructs the user-agent to block the response in the event that script has been inserted from user input, instead of sanitizing.

member.name: F:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.Constants.XssProtectionConstants.Report
member.summary: A partially supported directive that tells the user-agent to report potential XSS attacks to a single URL. Data will be POST'd to the report URL in JSON format. {0} specifies the report URL, including protocol

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder
member.summary: Exposes methods to build a policy.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddDefaultSecurePolicy
member.summary: Add default headers in accordance with the most secure approach

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddFrameOptionsDeny
member.summary: Add X-Frame-Options DENY to all requests. The page cannot be displayed in a frame, regardless of the site attempting to do so

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddFrameOptionsSameOrigin
member.summary: Add X-Frame-Options SAMEORIGIN to all requests. The page can only be displayed in a frame on the same origin as the page itself.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddFrameOptionsSameOrigin(System.String)
member.summary: Add X-Frame-Options ALLOW-FROM {URI} to all requests, where the URI is provided The page can only be displayed in a frame on the specified origin.
member.param: The URI of the origin in which the page may be displayed in a frame

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyNoReferrer
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy No_Referrer to all requests. The Referrer header will be omitted entirely. No referrer information is sent along with requests.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyNoReferrerWhenDowngrade
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy No_Referrer_When_Downgrade to all requests. This is the user agent's default behavior if no policy is specified. The URL is sent as a referrer when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTP→HTTP, HTTPS→HTTPS), but isn't sent to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyOrigin
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Origin to all requests. Only send the origin of the document as the referrer in all cases. The document https://example.com/page.html will send the referrer https://example.com/.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyOriginWhenCrossOrigin
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Origin_When_Cross_Origin to all requests. Send a full URL when performing a same-origin request, but only send the origin of the document for other cases.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicySameOrigin
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Same_Origin to all requests. A referrer will be sent for same-site origins, but cross-origin requests will contain no referrer information.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyStrictOrigin
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Strict_Origin to all requests. Only send the origin of the document as the referrer when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTPS→HTTPS), but don't send it to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyStrictOriginWhenCrossOrigin
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Strict_Origin_When_Cross_Origin to all requests. Send a full URL when performing a same-origin request, only send the origin when the protocol security level stays the same (HTTPS→HTTPS), and send no header to a less secure destination (HTTPS→HTTP).

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddReferrerPolicyUnsafeUrl
member.summary: Add Referrer-Policy Unsafe_Url to all requests. Send a full URL when performing a same-origin or cross-origin request. This policy will leak origins and paths from TLS-protected resources to insecure origins. Carefully consider the impact of this setting.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddXssProtectionEnabled
member.summary: Add X-XSS-Protection 1 to all requests. Enables the XSS Protections

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddXssProtectionDisabled
member.summary: Add X-XSS-Protection 0 to all requests. Disables the XSS Protections offered by the user-agent.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddXssProtectionBlock
member.summary: Add X-XSS-Protection 1; mode=block to all requests. Enables XSS protections and instructs the user-agent to block the response in the event that script has been inserted from user input, instead of sanitizing.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddXssProtectionReport(System.String)
member.summary: Add X-XSS-Protection 1; report=http://site.com/report to all requests. A partially supported directive that tells the user-agent to report potential XSS attacks to a single URL. Data will be POST'd to the report URL in JSON format.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddContentTypeOptionsNoSniff
member.summary: Add X-Content-Type-Options nosniff to all requests. Can be set to protect against MIME type confusion attacks.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddStrictTransportSecurity
member.summary: Add the Strict Transport Security Header

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.RemoveServerHeader
member.summary: Removes the Server header from all responses

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.AddCustomHeader(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a Custom Header to all request

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.RemoveHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a Custom Header from all request

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds a new using the entries added.

member.name: T:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersMiddleware
member.summary: An ASP.NET middleware for adding security headers.

member.summary: Instantiates a new .
member.param: The next middleware in the pipeline.
An instance of the which can be applied.

member.summary: Invoke the middleware

member.summary: The extensions for adding Security headers middleware support.

member.name: M:RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersMiddlewareExtensions.UseSecurityHeadersMiddleware(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,RWD.Toolbox.Ui.Middleware.SecurityHeaders.SecurityHeadersBuilder)
member.summary: Adds middleware to your web application pipeline to automatically add security headers to requests
member.param: The IApplicationBuilder passed to your Configure method.
A configured policy builder to build a policy.

member.summary: Defines the policy for customizing security headers for a request.
